name: unified_receipt
desc: An object that contains information about the most recent in-app purchase transactions for the app.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The environment for which the App Store generated the receipt.

items.name: latest_receipt_info
items.desc: An array that contains the latest 100 in-app purchase transactions of the decoded value in latest_receipt. This array excludes transactions for consumable products your app has marked as finished. The contents of this array are identical to those in responseBody.Latest_receipt_info in the verifyReceipt endpoint response for receipt validation.

items.name: pending_renewal_info
items.desc: An array in which each element contains the pending renewal information for each auto-renewable subscription identified in product_id. The contents of this array are identical to those in responseBody.Pending_renewal_info in the verifyReceipt endpoint response for receipt validation.

items.name: status
items.desc: The status code, where 0 indicates that the notification is valid.
